title: Wild Rescue Rangers Programme at Singapore Zoo
blurb: Dive into animal habitats and survival traits!
description: This exciting programme blends outdoor adventures with essential first aid skills, helping children learn to care for wildlife and handle minor injuries. They will build empathy, responsibility, and confidence, while tackling real-world challenges. Perfect for families and children interested in wildlife and conservation, this programme offers a unique opportunity to learn about animal habitats and survival in an engaging and interactive way. Participants will gain hands-on experience and develop valuable skills while fostering a deeper appreciation for the natural world. The programme is designed to be both educational and fun, ensuring a memorable experience for all involved.

title: WILD Rescue Rangers Programme at Mandai Zoo School
blurb: Wildlife experiences and meal included in package.
description: The WILD Rescue Rangers programme at Mandai Zoo School offers immersive wildlife experiences and includes a meal. Participants can engage in various activities related to wildlife rescue and conservation. This program is designed to educate and inspire the next generation of wildlife enthusiasts. It provides a unique opportunity to learn about the challenges faced by animals in the wild and the efforts being made to protect them. The programme includes hands-on activities, interactive sessions, and close encounters with animals. It is suitable for families and individuals who are passionate about wildlife conservation and want to make a difference. The programme aims to foster a deeper understanding of the importance of biodiversity and the role we can all play in preserving it. Participants will gain valuable insights into the work of wildlife rangers and the skills required to rescue and rehabilitate animals. The programme is a fun and educational experience for all ages.

title: Guided Interactions with the Animals & Animal Feeding
blurb: Hands-on activities develop curiosity and love for nature
description: Engage in hands-on and interactive activities designed to cultivate curiosity, resilience, confidence, and a lasting appreciation for the natural world. These activities provide children with the opportunity to explore and connect with wildlife in meaningful ways. Perfect for families and children who are interested in learning more about animals and conservation. Through these experiences, children can develop a deeper understanding of the importance of protecting our planet and its inhabitants. These activities are designed to be both educational and enjoyable, fostering a lifelong love for nature.
venue_name: Singapore Zoo, ZooSchool, and Bird Paradise

title: Exclusive Experience at Singapore Zoo, ZooSchool
blurb: Behind-the-scenes visits explore wildlife and animal care.
description: Enjoy exclusive behind-the-scenes visits, encounters with wildlife, and interactive sessions where children can explore wildlife, conservation, and animal care within world-class wildlife parks. This unique experience offers an in-depth look at the inner workings of the zoo and provides valuable insights into the efforts being made to protect endangered species. Perfect for families and children who are passionate about animals and conservation. Through these exclusive experiences, children can develop a deeper understanding of the importance of preserving our planet's biodiversity and the role they can play in making a difference.
venue_name: Singapore Zoo, ZooSchool, and Bird Paradise

title: Exclusive Experience at Bird Paradise, ZooSchool
description: Explore wildlife, conservation, and animal care within world-class wildlife parks. This includes exclusive behind-the-scenes visits, encounters with wildlife and interactions where children can learn about the importance of protecting our planet's biodiversity. Activities include Survival Skills-Knot Tying and First Aid, teaching children essential skills like how to tie practical knots and respond calmly to minor emergencies with basic first-aid knowledge. This experience is designed to be family-friendly and educational, fostering a love for nature and conservation in children of all ages. It offers a unique opportunity to get up close and personal with animals while learning about their habitats and the challenges they face in the wild. The program aims to inspire the next generation of conservationists through engaging and interactive experiences.

title: Survival Skills-Knot Tying and First Aid Workshop
blurb: Learn knot tying & first aid skills for emergencies.
description: This workshop teaches children essential survival skills, including how to tie practical knots and respond calmly to minor emergencies with basic first-aid knowledge. The mission-based challenge is a hands-on and interactive activity designed by experts where kids nurture life skills as well as learn conservation awareness. This program is perfect for families and children who are interested in learning about wildlife and conservation. It provides a fun and engaging way to develop important life skills while fostering an appreciation for the natural world. The activities are designed to be both educational and entertaining, ensuring that participants have a memorable and enriching experience.

title: ZooSchool Educational Tours and Presentations
blurb: Educational tours, animal feedings, and presentations.
description: ZooSchool offers a variety of educational tours and presentations designed to engage and educate visitors about wildlife and conservation. Activities include tours of Fragile Forest and Elephants of Asia, animal feedings, presentations like 'Into The Wild' and 'Predator on Wings', and behind-the-scenes looks at avian healthcare. The programs are designed for families and children interested in learning more about animals and their habitats. Buffet lunch options are available at Ah Meng Bistro and Penguin Cove Restaurant. The tours cover a wide range of animals, including proboscis monkeys, orangutans, and various bird species. First aid simulations and rescue missions are also part of the program.

title: Bird Paradise Educational Tours and Presentations
blurb: Educational tours, animal feedings, and presentations.
description: Bird Paradise offers a variety of educational tours and presentations designed to engage and educate visitors about birdlife and conservation. Activities include tours on endangered species and Rwanda Nyungwe Forest Heart of Africa, starling feeding, and presentations like 'Predator on Wings'. The programs are designed for families and children interested in learning more about birds and their habitats. Buffet lunch options are available at Penguin Cove Restaurant. The tours cover a wide range of bird species. Behind-The-Scenes of Avian Healthcare and Research Centre and educational tour of Hong Leong Foundation Crimson Wetlands are also part of the program.

title: ZooSchool Premises at Mandai Wildlife Reserve
blurb: Explore wildlife education programs at ZooSchool.
description: ZooSchool offers various educational programs and camps for children to learn about wildlife and conservation. The programs include hands-on activities, guided tours, and interactive sessions. Meals during the camp are complimentary, with vegetarian and non-vegetarian options available. The health and safety of all children and staff are ensured, and instructors reserve the right to refuse participation to any child who appears visibly unwell. Please note that food and snacks provided may contain traces of nuts. In the event of unforeseen circumstances, there may be slight variations to the camp activities. Meeting and dismissal points will be at the respective parks or ZooSchool premises.

title: Wild Rescue Rangers Camp at Singapore Zoo
blurb: Embark on a wild adventure at the Singapore Zoo!
description: The Wild Rescue Rangers camp at Singapore Zoo offers an immersive experience for children to learn about wildlife conservation and animal rescue. Through engaging activities and hands-on experiences, young rangers will discover the importance of protecting endangered species and their habitats. The camp includes interactive sessions with animal care specialists, behind-the-scenes tours of the zoo's facilities, and opportunities to participate in simulated rescue missions. Children will develop a deeper understanding of the challenges faced by wildlife and the role they can play in conservation efforts. This family-friendly program is designed to inspire a lifelong passion for animals and the environment.

title: ZooSchool Health and Safety Information Center
blurb: Health and safety guidelines for ZooSchool visitors.
description: ZooSchool prioritizes the health and safety of all children and staff. Parents are requested to inform ZooSchool immediately if their child or any household member is recovering from a contagious illness. Instructors reserve the right to refuse participation to any child who appears visibly unwell on the day of camp. For further inquiries, contact zooschool@mandai.com. Opening hours are from 9:00am to 5:00pm daily. The address is 80 Mandai Lake Road, Singapore 729826. Stay connected for updates and information regarding health and safety measures at ZooSchool.
full_address: Opening Hours Mon - Sun: 9:00am to 5:00pm Address 80 Mandai Lake Road, Singapore 729826 Stay Connected
